item.title: MSNBC and NBC News Set for Editorial Split Next Month
item.description: After nearly 30 years of sharing resources and editorial staff, the soon-to-be-renamed MS NOW will begin operating its own news operation Oct. 6.

item.title: MSNBC and NBC News Set for Editorial Split Next Month
item.description: After nearly 30 years of sharing resources and editorial staff, the soon-to-be-renamed MS NOW will begin operating its own news operation Oct. 6.

item.title: The Big MSNBC-NBC News Split Starts Oct. 6
item.description: The “NBC” is coming out of MSNBC — and so too are many of the NBC News personnel who appear regularly on the cable network. A day will come in the not-too-distant future when NBC New

item.title: Jacob Soboroff Joining MSNBC As Split From NBC News Looms
item.description: Soboroff will become senior national and political correspondent, based in L.A., as MSNBC sets to spin into Versant.

item.title: Jacob Soboroff Joining MSNBC As Split From NBC News Looms
item.description: Soboroff will become senior national and political correspondent, based in L.A., as MSNBC sets to spin into Versant.

item.title: ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP Meghan Rafferty Exits to Join Versant
item.description: Rafferty will be vp of news standards, guiding the MSNBC and CNBC news operations once the Versant split is complete.

item.title: Meghan Rafferty, ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP, to Join Versant
item.description: The top producer of “NBC Nightly News” is the latest NBC News staffer to join the company that is splitting off from NBC News — and taking employees and some critical revenue with it

item.title: Meghan Rafferty, ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP, to Join Versant
item.description: The top producer of “NBC Nightly News” is the latest NBC News staffer to join the company that is splitting off from NBC News — and taking employees and some critical revenue with it
